评论详情: Absolutely love this shirt. Size and style are great.Material is medium thickness so not too bulky. Was very warm and pairs nicely with jeans or dockers.?
Color and design were nice but sizing was way off (too big).

These are true to size.  I am 5’2, 230 pounds and ordered a size 2x based on previous reviews.  Ignore anything that says these are oversized.  I could have honestly gone with a 3x so that I had room to layer up under, but wearing it by itself. a 2x is a true fit.  It is very soft!  I received many compliments on it.

Definitely stick to your true size or size down. Amazon suggested a XL for me I did a large instead and I ended up having to return for a medium. The large was way too big. The medium is perfect still oversized but has shape and is so cute. The material is very comfortable and a little thicker which is perfect for the north, warm but not too hot. Great quality.
I love love BUT it looks like it's made inside-out, unfinished. Every time I wash it I think it's on the wrong side but it's not! Nice quality tho and if they go on sale I'll buy 1 or 2 more.
Color was as shown, fit accurate, well-made, very comfortable. Washed well!

It fits great! I ordered a Medium according to Amazon's recommendation. It was rather baggy. So, I returned it, got a Small and it is perfect!! I'm 5'2", weigh 124. I do NOT wear crew neck shirts and had to search for a v-neck. This is great! It has 5 brass buttons down the front so you can adjust it. Soooo many sweatshirts were not of real sweatshirt material, and reviews said they were not very warm. This one is just right for me - not too thick and not too thin. I needed it for walking my dogs on cold winter mornings. Paired it with sweat pants from Amazon and they are great. I bought black. I am going to get another color shirt and pants. Can't speak to how they launder yet, but I'm pleased so far.

评论概述: Great for - but it came damaged
评论详情: The product itself is nice and fits well. Material is medium thickness and seems to be decent quality. But it has tons of faded patches all over the front.  Exchanging it to see if it's a fluke or just bad quality.
Heavy in weight, good length. Not super flattering though. It’s just okay.
This shirt is made of good quality material and very soft inside.  Very comfortable and warm.  I plan to purchase it in additional colors.

I ordered this in green and loved it so much, I ordered blue. The sweatshirt is a medium to heavy weight. We'll put together and quality fabric. I've had no shrinkage (I wash in cold...use medium dryer). I would purchase others....the colors are as on the site.

Size Large and I’m 5’7 165 lbs .This is my winter staple I have it in various colors. I didn’t post a pic it looks just like the model lol. Great with leggings and jeans , boots or sneakers. Super versatile. Very light but warm. Great price, nice colors that wash well. Stretches nice and drys nice in the dryer.
Fits great. Comfortable. Looks great with jeans.

From the image, this looked like a lightweight shirt but it is actually just like a sweatshirt with the fleece underneath. Too warm for my climate.  I returned it. I would love for it to be made in a different fabric.
I previously ordered the same top in different color. I love it. However  the red the snaps are falling off. The quality in this top isn’t measuring up to t the other one.

Looks nice,  it’s soft fabric and well made. Color was more like a light army green, a bit of a surprise. It’s Ragged look, which i liked. It runs small, a 3XL doesn’t fit well, more like a sz 20, 1x. The hem is snug, rides everytime I sit stand, so shirtail is short.  It was snug fit chest, shoulders, hem. I like loose fit, not snug. I am returning and can’t replace it, 3xl is biggest size.  Im out return shipping and that’s disappointing.
I love this top.  A true red, very soft, super comfortable.  A medium weight, some stretchyness.
This top makes your waist look huge! It stops at your waist and bunches up. Too bulky and unattractive unless constantly pulling it down. I am only 5’2.75”

I ordered the mint green in size 2X. I would consider the color true to the name, but not the picture that is advertised. It’s more of a grey-light green. A lot of people say how soft it is, but in my opinion it’s just standard sweatshirt fabric. It’s not that soft. I consider soft a bamboo viscose or a polyester. It fit my lower half but not upper half well, but that is likely due to my own body shape. There was a lot of extra fabric around the armpit. Overall, I think it is a standard sweatshirt with cute details like the dark colored snaps and inside out stitching. I don’t think it’s worth keeping though, I will likely return.

So disappointed! After washing I noticed the outside looked inside out and arm holes had raw edges sticking out. Never saw anything like this before. I just simply threw it out in the trash. Save your money on this one.
Well made stylish sweatshirt.  Very cozy and comfortable on those chilly days. Love it so much I ordered in another color.
Love this!! So comfortable and warm.  I’m about 5’5  about 140 lbs I sized up and was happy with my size Large. Will be ordering other colors.
This is sooo cute and nice quality. I just wish I had gone up one size because it shrunk a bit in the dryer on the delicate setting.

The ONLY good thing is the color,  was perfect for my need.  It's been washed 3 times & hang dries.  Worn very few times. 1) (My fault for not REALLY looking)  several people have ask why I'm wearing my shirt inside out.  No  the seams are sewn that way  2) as said,  washed very few times & it's falling apart.If you're looking for a particular color....keep looking.

It’s hard to find a shirt with the thickness of an actual sweatshirt these days. This is comfortable, warm, and cute too. Have washed a few times, and it still looks great! Bought a medium, which is what I usually wear.
Love this! Fits well, comfy!
Love the fit and color!

Really like this top. Ordered three more in different colors after I received the first one. I telework and this is perfect for comfort and when I have to be on camera. I usually wear M to L and M in this style worked nicely. I only gave it 4 stars because I prefer clothes I can put in the dryer or dry clean.
My normal size fits perfectly and the color is exactly what is shown in the picture.
I love the fit, the material and the style of the shirt. What I ordered look like a brownish beige what I got was mustard yellow.
Very nice material.  Fits great!
Medium weight- feels good on- not as hot as wearing a sweatshirt 😊
Love this piece! Super comfy but still looks very nice on. Got the light blue color and it’s the perfect shade of baby blue.
My wife got this for herself. She likes it but it did not keep its length after she washed it.
This sweatshirt passed my expectations. Fit is excellent, quality is great, very warm. I ordered gray, color is a gray with flakes of black. Will order more.

It took longer than most products I have ordered from Amazon. The sweatshirt is attractive and the fabric is a good weight. I like the color, and the quality is OK. I ordered a large but it fits like extra large. I decided to keep it because the stock was running out when I ordered it.
The color is not true heather green like in listing and it arrived with stains on the front. Returned!
The thicker material is perfect for colder days in Texas, very comfortable! I will order another one, great to wear with jeans!, it fits great (not tight)!
It washes well. It is comfortable.....warm, but not too warm.
Perfect and soft!
Great sweatshirt! It’s warm and cozy but still stylish.

When i first opened this I wasn't happy. It is sewn so it kind of looks like it is inside out. However I wore it and now it is my favorite sweatshirt. I reach for it every week. It is so soft and comfortable. I love the fact it has the front pouch and no hoodie. I don't like hoodies.
Cute sweatshirt, feels a little tight across my shoulders, should have sized up
I love the sweatshirt unfortunately this was delivered all wrinkled not folded and stuffed in a bag! It looks like it has been worn!
Love the color - fit - feel and style of this top.  Fashionable to wear out or lounge at home.  You won't be disappointed if you purchase!

评论概述: White is not white, it is cream
评论详情: Not only is the color way off, but the item has a banded bottom which is not shown in the photo.  And for the price, the quality of the item leaves much to be desired.  Back it goes!
This is a great quality shirt. Very soft. I have a very similar one that is a name brand and this is  so close in quality for less. Runs tts.

评论概述: I received the shirt and it has a slice in the right front
评论详情: Over all the shirt is good quality except for the slice in the right front of the shirt it’s about an half of a inch looks like it was cut with a razor blade
Nice
Love the color, fit and texture of this shirt would definitely buy another one!

Love this top! Fits great, love the high collar, very comfy. Great for layering. Ordered B Green, love the color, very true to pic. It is a solid, not heathered as it seemed in the pic. Size up if want oversized.
True to size!! It fits great, is super comfortable,  and a great price! I need more colors 😍🤩

These sweatshirts are great, the material the softness they are wonderful. I was shocked and surprised on how they felt. if you have not bought these you should.  I’m being very honest. They are true to size. I absolutely love mine.
Very comfortable,  washes well, size is good.
It was to big at shoulders

I am 5’6 212 pounds size 16/18 and the 2xl is true to size. It’s not oversized but a little extra room. This is a very well made shirt, good quality. I love the kit and it perfect thickness for a cooler California day. Definitely glad I purchased.
This sweatshirt is phenomenal! I bought a size medium, it is very true to size. The quality, the weight  of it & the soft feel of it…..all wonderful! I will be purchasing more colors!!
I love this shirt but I washed it and the arm length shrunk and fits different now and I washed warm and line dryed.

Definitely NOT a fan of the raggedy inside-out unraveling seams. Made the sweatshirt (yes actually a sweatshirt not a thick tshirt!) look a bit trashy, in my opinion, so I will be returning it.  What a shame since it was comfy and soft, oversized fit, sleeves were LONG enough!, and pink color was perfect.  Not sure how durable the ribbing would be at the pockets since it wasn’t very stretchy.
Good quality. Color matches the photo. Very roomy. Order 1 size down if you want it to be more fitted. I like the snaps on the neckline.
Great sweatshirt. Super soft.  I’ve bought it in 2 colors so far and may buy another. Very comfortable. Washes up great. Highly recommend.
This sweatshirt runs small and the color definitely does not match the picture or description. Also, when you return it they will not refund your money.
Super cute, soft and oversized which is what I was looking for

评论概述: My second one - love them - super cozy
评论详情: Thick, cotton-feeling sweatshirts with cute snap and seam detail!  I have the green and gray and both are great colors.  They wash up well too!
Quilted type shirt. Nice weight, warm but not too heavy. Nice lime to olive green color. Fits true to size.
Soft, warm, and easy to dress up.
The seams are inside out and has more of a old sweatshirt feel to it. Not what I was looking for.
It fits great, but after washing it, it collects white fuzz balls all over it. So you will need a lint roller.
Love the texture of this shirt! Such a great sweatshirt I want one in every color!
Love this sweatshirt.  So comfy & very nice fit.
The shirt was assembled inside out. I missed my return window because it was a Christmas gift and did not notice until I started wrapping it
You can wash it over and over and throw it in the dryer and the material still looks the same. I like the details like the buttons and the collar. It is a staple for me!
I loved this sweatshirt I only tried it on and a button came off. Buyer beware

Looks as pictured, soft and not too thick. I will buy again
Too bulky. Returned

I was so happy to see a classy sweatshirt without a hood for a change. I bought 3 in different colors and get lit of compliments.
Nice look
It looks a lot cheaper in person.  The color is not wine color as it appears in the pic.
I ordered a mdium, should have gone with a small, but very cute and I'll keep it.
Food on shirt when received. Appears to be worn.

Very Pretty shirt, nice soft material, but I am exchanging it for an XL. It as a little tight.
Item was way too large, two people could have fit in it! Amazon suggested a XL , I’m a Size fourteen and a large would have been suffice.

Accurate description & good fit
Casual and cute top. Fits well. Nice fabric. Recommended!
This is an amazing piece. Wears well and colors are great. Runs a tad small.
Very comfortable I like the color a lot

I’ve been looking forever for sweatshirt with an open neckline and I thought I found it. This is sewed together with all the seams on the outside. It looks like you are wearing your shirt inside out. Will definitely be returning. So very disappointing.
I would give this a 5 if the sleeves were longer in the large size. The XL is  too big but the sleeves fit. Overall a great sweatshirt.
I absolutely love this shirt! The fit is great, the color is perfect, and I love how warm and snuggly it feels. I've had compliments on it every single time I've worn it.
Runs a little large.  Order it in green.  Wish it was more of a sage color and less Kermit.
Great fitting , quality and style. Will purchase more of this style seller
Bought two of these.  One for me and one for a girlfriend (we both love pink).  Bought a large because I like my sweatshirts roomy.  Fits perfectly, just the way I like it.
Correct size and  nice and soft

This is a very comfortable sweatshirt. Very soft and not too heavy. The red is a true red and looks great on. I also bought a white one. I'd love to buy one in every color. I wear it alone without a top under it. Super cute!

评论概述: Versatile for casual or dress up
评论详情: Great quality and color.  Wish it was a tad longer.  The material is perfect for the chilly days.  Have gotten many compliments on the style and color.

评论概述: Do not go by size chart -- order normal size
评论详情: I made the classic mistake of ordering according to the size chart. I normally order a large but the size chart indicated a medium would be sufficient. I meant to return it but missed the window. It fits, but a large would have been preferable.
